Are you sure you want to set the \"{{tit: Are you sure you want to set the "{{title}}" field as a record unique key? This setting cannot be changed after it's been set.
Field synchronization confirmation promp: Are you sure you want to synchronize fields from database? Depends on the number of tables and fields, This operation may take anywhere from a few seconds to several dozen seconds. If you only need to sync specific tables, please use the "Configure Fields" - "Sync from database" for those tables.
Filter data based on the specific field,: Filter data based on the specific field, with the requirement that the field value must be unique.
If a collection lacks a primary key, you: If a collection lacks a primary key, you must configure a unique record key to locate row records within a block, failure to configure this will prevent the creation of data blocks for the collection.
No external data source plugin installed: No external data source plugin installed
